title: What are the refund rules for PESU?
content:
It only says if I don't opt for any seat then I'll be given a refund

What if I opt a seat and choose to withdraw on a later date?

comments.body: I think you will get full refund(340000/-)  if you surrender the seat b4 the deadline
You get the 3.3L refund but you don't get the counselling fee back (afaik)
do they mention the deadline anywhere, because I've been going through all the documents like crazy but can't find anything
If you select a seat in the first round of counselling then ur deadline is 24th sept. The date is mentioned in the  pessat> important dates web page also it shud be mentioned in the mail u received

thanks for the quick reply

just one more question

Will I need original documents issued by school or the Digilocker documents suffecient ?
I had the same doubt so i requested my school to attest the documents i downloaded from digilocker for now, they told me the originals will take more time to arrive

ok, the issue is that my school is in a different state altogether so I can't even get my documents attested either

I think I'll have to ask about this during counselling itself as no one seems to be picking up calls at the university
I think the digilocker doc will work, other colleges are accepting tht as well. Its better if u get it confirmed frm the uni
